name: Table Mountain
address: Table Mountain National Park, Cape Town
description: Iconic flat-topped mountain offering hiking, panoramic views, and a cableway ride to the summit.

name: V&A Waterfront
description: A bustling harbor with shops, restaurants, live entertainment, and the Two Oceans Aquarium.

name: Bo-Kaap
description: Historic area known for its brightly painted houses and Cape Malay culture and cuisine.

name: Kirstenbosch Botanical Gardens
description: Renowned botanical gardens nestled at the foot of Table Mountain with diverse plant life and trails.

name: Cape Point
address: Cape of Good Hope, Cape Peninsula
description: Dramatic coastal cliffs and nature reserve with hiking paths, a lighthouse, and ocean views.

name: Robben Island
description: UNESCO World Heritage Site known as the prison location of Nelson Mandela. Accessible by ferry.

name: Muizenberg Beach
description: Popular surfing destination with colorful beach huts and gentle waves for beginners.

name: Boulders Beach
description: Unique beach famous for its colony of African penguins and clear, sheltered waters.
